name: multi-login
description: This enables multi-user authentication and sessions for cozy-light.   This works either by using the set-password command for each user or if the username contains an @ sign checking against the dovecot user. It also installs americano plugins for cozy-light apps to enable multiple user support. (multi-emails, cozydb-multi for emails) Additionally, a login.css will be read from `~/.cozy-light/login/public/css, if found. Uses signed cookies for sessions (see options under cookie-session readme.).
